snippet.title: Title: Climate Forcing by the Volcanic Eruption of Mount Pinatubo. Revised edition
snippet.description:
Title: Climate Forcing by the Volcanic Eruption of Mount Pinatubo. Revised edition
Authors: David H. Douglass, Robert S. Knox
Comments: 22 pages, including 4 figures. Revised version of a paper [Douglass D. H. and R. S. Knox (2005), Climate forcing by the volcano eruption of Mount Pinatubo. Geophys. Res. Lett. 32, L05710.doi: 10.1029/2004GL022119]. Revision is based on subsequent comments and replies to appear in the same journal. Quantitative results have only minor changes
Subjects: Geophysics (physics.geo-ph); Atmospheric and Oceanic Physics (physics.ao-ph)
